aws_eks.name: AWS EKS

aws_eks.pre_script:
#!/bin/bash
# Verify required tools
kubectl version --client || exit 1
aws --version || exit 1

aws_rds.name: AWS RDS Instance
aws_rds.pre_script:
#!/bin/bash
# Check if required secrets are set
if [ -z "$DB_PASSWORD" ]; then
  echo "Error: DB_PASSWORD is not set"
  exit 1
fi
